data.message:
Please help; 

I am trying to get a page removed as it was created and now can't be accessed.  We have set up a new page and so we now have duplicate pages for the same place.  I have reported this a few times through the reporting tool but don't get any response and it's still live.  It's getting very confusing for all.

replies.message: Hey, Karen. For questions about ads or Pages, please reach out to our business team here: http://bit.ly/2m0FdwB. Thanks! -Rhea
